mapper.insert: insert into weibo_tweet (id, `time`, source, `like`, transfer, comment, content, source_tid, flag, uid) value (#{id}, #{time}, #{source}, #{like}, #{transfer}, #{comment},#{content}, #{sourceTid}, #{flag}, #{uid})
